name: Hy nogodu
description:
A remake of an old game from the USSR. You need to catch eggs that roll towards you from four sides. The more eggs you catch, the better. If you do not have time to catch the egg, then it breaks. When the third egg breaks, you lose. Also, over time, the eggs become more and more. Every 50 eggs caught, the broken eggs limit is restored.

Controls:

A/D or   to move

SPACE to up bag
